header.title: Product Launch Event
header.project: Dan Savi Car Showcase & Shaver Gaming Event
header.purpose: The meeting is to discuss the planning, budgeting, and logistical aspects of the Dan Savi Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming events, including media invites, vendor coordination, safety measures, and potential cross-promotions.
header.attendees: Alia, Rohimi, Azfar, Kang, Jet, Sebastian

tasks.Description: Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability to get clear figures.
Inform client upstairs to stick with Center Court for the car showcase.
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound budget and report back.
Lock in Can Lim's Twitch slot.
Handle the Dan Savi media invites.
Confirm the custom rack specs with Tech Zone and email the dash dimensions to use partner.
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events.
Follow up with the fire department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events and confirm.
Ping the vendor directly and get a concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear and update share document.
Map out specific routes and timings for loading and unloading cars and gaming equipment.

Explore cross-promotion opportunities between Dan Savi and Shaver Gaming events, including talking to esports channel about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV and Autobus about a casual gaming peripheral review.
Reach out to Xbox and Logitech, the Shaver gaming sponsors, to explore cross-promotional budget and potential giveaway.
Chase the fire department to get the logistic renovation fire safety audit clearance sorted.
